https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8coSv7ukYcpLKxg4JVS4nmQtC3r.jpg The many faces of Barcelona are portrayed in this documentary, shot in a false sequence shot that goes across the streets, squares, markets and bars of a city that is presented as both conventional and law-breaking, exquisit and shameless, elegant and dispossessed. Barcelona, la rosa de foc
